arts.ttl: Arne Slot talks Vinicius, Trent, Xabi Alonso, Isak ahead of Liverpool vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: Real Madrid are set to travel to Anfield for a high-stakes Champions League group stage encounter, hoping to carry the momentum of one of their best-ever starts to a season. While Los Blancos are in formidable form, their opponents, Liverpool, are still finding their footing in this new season and are dealing with significant injury […] The post Arne Slot talks Vinicius, Trent, Xabi Alonso, Isak ahead of Liverpool vs Real Madrid appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot delivers worrying Alexander Isak injury update ahead of Liverpool's Real Madrid and Man City double-header
arts.sum: The £125million man has scored just one goal since his much-slated move to Merseyside but has been irked by fitness concerns exacerbated by a recent groin injury.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Predicted Lineup vs. Liverpool: Alonso Picks Similar XI to El Clasico
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso is hopeful of enjoying a more fruitful Anfield homecoming on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid star to be benched again vs Liverpool

arts.ttl: Slot happy to welcome Alexander-Arnold’s return to Anfield with Real Madrid
arts.sum: The Champions League draw set up a quick return to Liverpool for Alexander-Arnold, who has said he’ll love the club for life and has mixed emotions about the upcoming game. Trent Alexander-Arnold will receive a hearty welcome from Liverpool manager Arne Slot when he returns to Anfield with Real Madrid on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Early Man City blows for Liverpool as Slot provides team news for Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot confirms the availability of Jeremie Frimpong, Alisson Becker and Alexander Isak's for the Reds' impending Champions League clash with Real Madrid at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Real Madrid: Predicted Lineup for the Champions League Clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid take on Liverpool in the Champions League on November 4, looking to make it four wins from four and have a statement win in the elite European competition. Former Liverpool player Trent Alexander-Arnold could start, but due to his lack of playing time since he returned from injury, it's likely to be Fede Valverde again.
